court: HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM
outcome: /JUDGMENT IN CC 622/2019 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS-I ,MANJERI CRIME NO.385/2019 OF Manjeri Police Station , Malappuram PETITIONER: MUJEEB RAHMAN, AGED 47 YEARS, S/O.ABDURAHMAN , ALIYATHODI
full_text: Bl Eee CI Ble te IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2020/KER/S66 PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE ASHOK MENON TUESDAY, THE 07TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 17TH POUSHA, 1941 Crl1.MC.No.8941 OF 2019 (G) AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CC 622/2019 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS-I ,MANJERI CRIME NO.385/2019 OF Manjeri Police Station , Malappuram PETITIONER: MUJEEB RAHMAN, AGED 47 YEARS, S/O.ABDURAHMAN , ALIYATHODI HOUSE, 22ND MILE, MULLAMBARA ROAD, P.O.MANJERI, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT. BY ADV. SRI.U.K.DEVIDAS RESPONDENTS: 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM. 2 JAMSHEER , AGED 37 YEARS, S/O.ABDULLA, AARUVEETTIL HOUSE, N.S.S.COLLEGE P.O., MANJERI, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT-676 552. R2 BY ADV. PRINSUN PHILIP OTHER PRESENT: SRI. C.S. HRITHWIK, SR. PUBLIC PROSECUTOR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 07.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Crl.MC.No.8941 OF 2019(Gc) 2020/KERIS66 2 ORDER Dated this the 7th day of January, 2020 The petitioner is the sole accused in C.C. No. 622 of 2019 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-I, Manjeri, for having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 323 & 324 of the IPC. The 27? respondent who is the defacto complainant and injured. He appeared through counsel and filed an affidavit to the effect that the matter has been amicably settled with the petitioner and that he has no further grievance against the petitioner. A report has been obtained from the investigating Officer through the Senior Public prosecutor. The petitioner has no criminal antecedents. No public interest is involved. Hence, the Crl.M.C is allowed and the entire proceedings in C.C No.622/2019 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-I, Manjeri stands quashed under Section 482 Cr.P.C and the accused is discharged. Sd/- ASHOK MENON JUDGE NR/07/01/20 Bl Eee CI Ei ie Crl.MC.No.8941 OF 2019(Gc) 2020/KERIS66 3 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE I CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FIRST INFORMATION REPORT AND F.I.S.IN CRIME NO.385/2019 OF MANJERI POLICE STATION DATED 17.08.2019. ANNEXURE II CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO.385/2019 OF VALANCHERI POLICE STATION DATED 26.08.2019. ANNEXURE III THE ORIGINAL OF THE AFFIDAVIT DATED 03.12.2019 EXECUTED BY THE SECOND RESPONDENT. RESPONDENTS' EXHIBITS: NIL //TRUE COPY// PA TO JUDGE
